text:
Hi there,
I have a "blog field" which uses a repeater to allow select multiple blog types. I would like to combining multiple sets of blog posts into a single listing like:
```{% set all_posts = (blog_one_posts + blog_two_posts) | sort(true, false, 'publish_date')  %} ```
Is there a way code to loop them and set them into set all_posts ?
I'm guessing you can use that blog selector as a repeater and stash all the blogs into a macro or array and then feed it into a all_posts = etc
Do you have an example how the code written?
